bg-hover.comment: Hover state background - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

bg-active.comment: Active state background - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

border-hover.comment: Hover state border - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

border-active.comment: Active state border - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-default.comment: Default text color - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-hover.comment: Hover state text - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-active.comment: Active state text - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-subtle.comment: Subtle text color - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-document.comment: Document text color - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

bg-hover.comment: Hover state background (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

bg-active.comment: Active state background (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

border-hover.comment: Hover state border (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

border-active.comment: Active state border (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-default.comment: Default text color (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-hover.comment: Hover state text (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-active.comment: Active state text (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-subtle.comment: Subtle text color (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

color-document.comment: Document text color (inverse) - Secondary actions (links, navigation)

transparent.comment: Fully transparent - for invisible backgrounds and borders

accent-color.comment: Form control accent color (checkboxes, radio buttons)

outline-color.comment: Focus outline color for use on tinted/dark backgrounds - opposite of outline-color
